text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Am shopping for a New President to vote for, you’re unbelievable how you respond to a simple question of how you turned out #COVID19 testing a world competition and Americans continue to die while you waste precious time on Twitter lying , Who are you ⁉️💯
